/usr/bin/c++ -g CMakeFiles/test.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/test.dir/ScreenRecorder.cpp.o -o test  /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavcodec.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavdevice.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavfilter.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavformat.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libavutil.so /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libswscale.so
